display_element.label: Input files:
display_element.description: Choose input fastq-format files to analyze.  Files should end with "_R1.fastq.gz" or "_R2.fastq.gz".  Unpaired files will be ignored.

display_element.label: Output filename:
display_element.description: Name the output file.  Result will be a "tar" archive.  If you enter "my_output", then the results will be "my_output.tar".

display_element.label: Reference genome
display_element.description: Choose the reference genome to use for this process.
